description:
I challenged myself on midnight of November 11th to make a game in less than 24 hours. I then made the foolish decision of going to sleep and woke up at 13:00. I eventually managed to finish the game on November 12th. Even though it's not within 24 hours, I still think it's pretty good for a game made quickly with less than 8 hours of actual work.

Controls:

Mouse to move around, Q to use blaster, W to build tower.
